response.explain: The previous action code failed because the robot was not within four meters of the bottle of sunscreen. This means that the robot needs to move closer to the bottle of sunscreen before it can grasp it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the bottle of sunscreen.
(2) Grasp the bottle of sunscreen.
(3) Move the robot to the carryall.
(4) Put the bottle of sunscreen in the carryall.
